thread.title: California Facial Plastic Surgeons Now Offering New Treatment for Double Chins
thread.title_full: California Facial Plastic Surgeons Now Offering New Treatment for Double Chins | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: California Facial Plastic Surgeons Now Offering New Treatment for Double Chins
text:
(MENAFN Press) Dr. David Kiener and Dr. Johnathan Sykes are now offering Kybella™ the first FDA-approved injectable that contours the appearance of submental fullness.

Sacramento CA – October 21 2015
Dr. David Kiener and Dr. Jonathan Sykes of Roseville Facial Plastic Surgery are proud to announce that they are now offering the first and only FDA-approved injectable drug that contours and improves the appearance of submental fullness. In order to further expand their aesthetic injectable portfolio and offerings to their patients Drs. Kiener and Sykes added Kybella™ to their list of non-invasive cosmetic procedures.
A 2014 survey conducted by the American Society for Dermatologic Surgery revealed that 68% of people are bothered by submental fullness also known as “double chin”. The common yet undertreated facial aesthetic condition impacts many adults men and women alike and makes them look older and heavier than they actually are. Submental fullness can be caused by aging genetics and weight gain. For some no amount of diet or exercise will eliminate their “double chins”.
is a non-surgical treatment made with the active ingredient deoxycholic acid a naturally occurring molecule that aids in the breakdown and absorption of dietary fat in the body. Kybella™ causes the destruction of fat cells beneath the chin so that they can no longer store or accumulate fat. Common side effects include swelling bruising pain numbness redness and areas of hardness in the treatment area. Patients will notice visible contouring of their chin profile in 1 to 4 treatments - The number of treatments depends on the amount of fat present as well as other factors that make some patients respond differently to a treatment than others which are all done at least one month apart. Results are permanent so another treatment may never be necessary.
To provide the best possible service to his patients Drs. Kiener and Sykes are dedicated to learning and providing the latest procedures in facial aesthetics. Therefore Drs. Kiener and Sykes are excited to offer Kybella™ to their patients that may be bothered by “double chin”. For more information on Kybella™ or Roseville Facial Plastic Surgery please visit .
About Roseville Facial Plastic Surgery
Roseville Facial Plastic Surgery provides plastic surgery services as well as non-surgical treatment options such as Ultherapy and Dermal Fillers to their greater Sacramento area patients.  Dr. Kiener and Dr. Sykes believe that the goal of facial aesthetic surgery is to create balanced proportion of all facial features. The team of highly specialized facial plastic surgeons Ultherapist patient coordinator medical assistants  and aestheticians at Roseville Facial Plastic Surgery offers the finest service and latest technology to provide the expertise and care you deserve  from board-certified facial plastic surgeons specializing in facial aesthetics for over 20 years.
